title: 91x35: Applicability of the Honoraria Ban to Compensation for Teaching Continuing Legal Education Programs
summary:
OGE discusses the effect of the honoraria ban on an agency attorney's ability to teach non-traditional continuing legal education courses.  

Notes: [Note: The honoraria ban was held unconstitutional by the U.S. Supreme Court in U.S. v. National Treasury Employees Union, 513 U.S. 454 (1995).]
